content: rosamande is a loose drop shoulder striped tee knitted from the top down the shoulders can be worked in a variety of different colours using intarsia reversing the stripe pattern changing just one of the two colours or both from 2 to 6 colours this can be as bold or as subtle as desired the top s simple construction makes it a quick project with easy to adjust shapes and length the pattern includes blank sketches for you to plan your colours as well as two neckline depths lower scoop like the neutral sample or higher crew neck like the colour sample **sizes ** 1 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 6
